comment: Actually a horrible experience that I can't recommend to anyone in good faith. She doesn't respond to emails for weeks, if at all. She is unclear on D2L quizzes (which account for a large portion of your grade and are vastly different than the assigned homework). More than 19 students failed the first quiz, many getting below a 10%. Seriously avoid

Absolutely DO NOT TAKE! Worst communication and course structure I've ever seen. The reading, homework, worksheet and quizzes are not harmonious. Teacher will not reply until a week later. She takes off points on things that were not in the instructions. I'll repeat DO NOT TAKE!!!
I will not take Kelly Linz she is the worst instructor I have ever had. DON'T TAKE THIS CLASS WITH HER.

I will not take Kelly Linz she is a horrible instructor. She will not answer emails in a timely manner she would take weeks to answer so if there was a question about any assignment will not get the help needed before the assignment due date.

If you're thinking "well she's young, maybe she'll be relatable and cool" then go take someone else lol. Too inexperienced for this class to be easy, pretty much all of us struggled with knowing when stuff was due, how to format answers, and if we were gonna pass. I just taught myself the content thru HW and passed. You'll pass, but loose hair.

Frequently showed up 5-10 minutes late. She fairly grades, but you wont get your results back for at least a month. She does require attendance and she does keep track of it. Not very accessible outside of class. I emailed her maybe 3 times through the semester and never gotten a response.

Shes a very helpful professor and as long as you pay attention she explains everything very well which makes the lesson easy. So far one of the best Ive had. She is considerate of others and offers plenty of help to boost your grade. I would highly recommend taking her class or having her as your professor overall !!

Kelly is amazing. She is super sweet and it shows by how she cares about her students. All she wants for her students is for them to pass and fall in love with Stats. The course only has three tests which she would have a whole day of review where you could ask literally anything. She's willing to stay behind for questions too. One of my favorite!!

Professor Linz is a graduate student. She is very knowledgable in stats, makes it very easy for you to understand everything. I loved her class and it was very easy all you have to do it show up and pay attention and you will pass!

She's a grad student which made it easier to relate/talk to her about any issues I was having with the course material. She is willing to help you as long as you are willing to help yourself. You'll do quite a bit of homework but it's honestly a grade booster. She's nice and funny which made class less miserable because I personally hate math.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Kelly is the bomb. She gives students so many chances to do well by dropping a quiz grade and giving extra credit. If you struggle with this class it is because you so not go to her for help. It is basic statistics which is not hard unless you miss a few classes. Just show up, ask questions, and youll easily pass. ��

very loud and she talks down to the class. she encourages questions but makes you look stupid in front of the class. has high expectations but does not teach you exactly what you should know. in general, (and this is being nice) she is not knowledgeable on the subject. for students who are decent at math, its still extremely difficult to pass
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: very hard and she is a grad student, so she is learning along with you and has trouble answering questions. she doesnt create her own lectures and does not come prepared to teach. she talks down to the students and does NOT have clear grading expectations, DO NOT TAKE HER!
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Mrs. Linz is awesome!! She's so fun and enjoyable and is a grad student so it's a lot more comfortable to ask her questions. She wants everyone to succeed and is more than willing to go over problems multiple times both in class and after. I would highly recommend her!!

I love Mrs. Linz. She makes Stats enjoyable. Her classes are never boring and she is funny. Mrs. Linz is currently a grad student so she understands how we feel and will definitely work with you. She is young just like most of the students so she can relate to almost everything. COME TO CLASS, STUDY, and ASK QUESTIONS... you will do amazing!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: She was alright, I guess. I'm trying to be as nice as possible. She spoke to us like we were dumb. I hated coming to that class. Stats 1107 is a gen ed course, no one wants to take that crap but we have to. get off your high horse.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY--LECTURE HEAVY
